account.title: Account Information
account.description: Update your username and email address

profile.username_hint: 3-50 characters. Letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens only.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your password. You will be logged out of other devices.
password.requirements: Min 10 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number
password.change_success: Password changed successfully. You will be logged out of other devices.

delete.title: Deactivate Account
delete.description: Deactivate your account temporarily. You have 30 days to reactivate by logging in, after which your account and data will be permanently deleted.
delete.warning_1: Your account will be deactivated immediately
delete.warning_2: You have 30 days to reactivate by logging in
delete.warning_3: After 30 days, all data will be permanently deleted
delete.warning_4: You can reactivate anytime within 30 days by logging in
delete.reason_placeholder: Let us know why you are leaving...
delete.reason_hint: Your feedback helps us improve our service
delete.dialog_title: Are you sure you want to deactivate?
delete.dialog_description: Your account will be deactivated and scheduled for permanent deletion in 30 days. You can restore your account by logging back in within this period.
delete.success: Account deactivated. You can reactivate within 30 days by logging in.
delete.grace_period_info: After deactivation, you have 30 days to reactivate your account by simply logging back in with your email and password.

what_is_copart.title: What is TrustedImporters.Ge?
what_is_copart.description1: This is a platform where trusted auto importers and American auctions are brought together in one place. We let you easily compare company prices, terms, and real customer feedback.
what_is_copart.description2: TrustedImporters.Ge simplifies the entire import process — you see the total cost right on the platform and directly connect with the company you prefer.
